name: Balance Beam - Amazing Princess Gymnastics
description:
Amazing Princess Gymnastic Balance Beam is a fantastic one touch balancing game where YOU get to perform! Are you ready to show your gymnastic skills on the balance beam and win the Amazing Princess Gymnastics championship ?
If you are, then download game and play today !

Try your best to victory while learning more about the gymnastics sports. Kids, boys and girls from all around the world will love this game and they will feel the excrement of a Gymnastics championship.

Amazing Gymnastic Balance Beam is a free top sporty game that features:
- Fantastic girly gymnastic gameplay.
-Very easy to play
-Very Exciting and challenging game for girls and boys.
-Girly sounds and graphics
- Free to play and download
